title: New Fiora skins please!!
body: {{champion:114}} Fiora is one of my favourite champions in all of league, and I know that many others think the same. Right now she only has two skins, not very nice looking skins, but only 2. Why not more? Should riot make more Fiora skins? Vote down below~{{item:3025}}

replies.body:
Hiya zachariefr,

Fiora hasn't seen a new skin in a while due to her update in the works. Once her update is completed, she'll be eligible for a skin.

Any ideas in mind for what you'd like to see?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QtxBwFVp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-23T21:02:13.344+0000)
>
> Hiya zachariefr,
> 
> Fiora hasn't seen a new skin in a while due to her update in the works. Once her update is completed, she'll be eligible for a skin.
> 
> Any ideas in mind for what you'd like to see?

Not sure why you were downvoted Katey, so I evened you out.

Personally, I remember seeing a Violinist Fiora that would be incredibly cool :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QtxBwFVp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-23T21:02:13.344+0000)
>
> Hiya zachariefr,
> 
> Fiora hasn't seen a new skin in a while due to her update in the works. Once her update is completed, she'll be eligible for a skin.
> 
> Any ideas in mind for what you'd like to see?

concerning the update, I would rather see the new design as a new skin. Rather than completely replacing the only one. (though my only problem with the new one is the hair. they should keep the old hair style.)

But if you do end up replacing the default skin. Can you at least make the classic skin available. (preferably for not too much.)
I'd love something based off Erika from Fire Emblem. Would be cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Sophitia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QtxBwFVp,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2015-07-23T21:21:45.064+0000)
>
> I'd love something based off Erika from Fire Emblem. Would be cool.

I second this. I'm a Huge Fire Emblem fan and honestly think any of the lord like designs. Lucian/Eirika would work well. I'd also be VERY down with a Samurai Fiora skin.  There's that Chosen/Foresaken concept also floating around. I would also **BEG** you to consider a traditional skin. 

 Honestly. I'd settle for even a Chroma at this point. 

Honestly, Fiora hasn't gotten any skin love other than that halloween "Skin" I don't like talking about and that was back in 2012.

OOOOOOHHHH! YESS RITO PLZ.
''Blazing Insignia Fiora'' ;P
U_U I would love to see a Arclight Fiora Skin. :O there is so much fun potential

Noone suggested Forsaken Fiora?
https://41.media.tumblr.com/212bd2570e8b0cb2e29831520c36bb6a/tumblr_no907sTWtg1qk32lpo1_1280.png

 holding  the lightsaber like count dooku (rip)
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11118/111184078/4335559-2406989277-count.jpg

Maybe one that's sorta evil themed? Noxus Fiora? 

Honestly, anything that isn't just another "changes of clothes" for Fiora would be great. Doesn't necessarily have to be a "theme" skin, but, something different.

***P.s. All images were found via google images and the rights to the pictures go towards the original creators. I only found them and find them pretty awesome and would love to see them as skins for one of my favorite champions whom I am in love with XD***

Thank you so much for answering haha! And i would love to see skins that show a darker side to fiora{{champion:114}} or even some silly/cute skins that take a bit off the deadly edge!

Thanks again for answering :)!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QtxBwFVp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-23T21:02:13.344+0000)
>
> Hiya zachariefr,
> 
> Fiora hasn't seen a new skin in a while due to her update in the works. Once her update is completed, she'll be eligible for a skin.
> 
> Any ideas in mind for what you'd like to see?


Well we could have A Pool Party Fiora, A Neon Robot Fiora. Idk how Rito comes with skins idea T_T

You guys have some awesome ideas for skins - some of which I've actually never seen before for Fiora. :o 

I think it's possible to think of both badass, dark skins (like Forsaken Fiora), as well as some of the more light-hearted themes (Star Guardian, or some of xArchangel's ideas).  Her current skins fall into more of a neutral/comical (Headmistress Fiora!) state, so I could certainly see a lot of these ideas working.

I think her updated kit (especially her ult) provide awesome opportunities to really personalize the thematic with the decal that displays. She has a bit more of a visual aspect when it comes to her particles, which really allows for us to give her skins more personality!

Would be cool if nightraven Fiora got red ability effects.
If not, please make Forsaken Fiora and give her red effects D:
I just thought of another: Star Guardian Fiora anyone?
With this Fiora VU can make a moon walker fiora skin, she fits perfect now
Technically she has 3, but one is only available during Halloween. It has been a long time since a release for her though, but I assume they'll have one with the rework. :)
She is being reworked soon sooo.
I don't want new skins.  I want her old model and splash back.  This is a terrible direction IronStylus is forcing on everything.  Why does that guy hate feminine features and female skin so much?
